system.description: The character is a doctor, nurse, therapist or other person dedicated to helping heal others. They likely have access to an office where they practice their craft.
system.examples: Doc Samson, Doctor Strange, the Night Nurse (Linda Carter), Thor (Jane Foster).

system.description: The character has an edge on Logic checks to determine what is medically wrong with someone they examine.
The character knows how to administer first aid. They have an edge on Logic checks to stop bleeding.
